custom-meta.meta-value: Weekly Ebola virus disease incidence numbers from Sierra Leone are available from the World Health Organization website ( http://apps.who.int/gho/data/node.ebola-sitrep.ebola-country-SLE-latest?lang=en), and were last accessed on November 18, 2015. Files containing the data and codes for the deterministic model, sensitivity analysis, Monte Carlo simulations and related statistics are available in the Supplementary Materials.
